domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.

text: @DrOz Hey Dr. Oz.  Sadly, you and Dr. Phil have been deleted!! Auntie O gave you your start and the knowledge of how it’s affecting Black folks didn’t stop you from joining Trumps Kool Aid kids!! Covid-19 killed my Dad!! You are a biomedical terrorist promoting genocide! Disgraceful!!
